title: Tag-Along Goat
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 211 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 310L, Fiction Series
description: The monsters visit a petting zoo and feed the animals. Everything appears to be going well until a goat escapes and follows them home. Now they are faced with the problem of getting a stubborn goat back to the zoo. Tag-Along Goat is the perfect book to introduce story elements. Humorous pictures support the text.
